revised_title: On the Velocity of Cathode Particles Emitted by Various Metals under the Influence of Röntgen Rays and its Implications for Atomic Disintegration
tldr: The authors investigate the velocity of cathode particles emitted by various metals under the influence of Röntgen rays. They find that the velocity of the ejected electrons is primarily due to the energy of the explosion within the atom, suggesting that atomic disintegration is taking place.
